name: Fluffy Creatures VS The World
description: Fluffy Creatures VS The World is a simple platforming indie game that puts the player in control of Fluffy McCuddleston, a member of a peaceful, intellectual race. Can you save yourself and the entire Fluffyland?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or above Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 (or later) compatible graphics card Storage: 800 MB available space
